content.rendered:
Hopefully your FAQ , Frequently Asked Questions have been addressed below. If you have any further questions please call one of our friendly team on 07729 845761 and we will be more than happy to explain anything and everything to you.

Are you fully insured?

Yes we have full business and public liability insurance.

Do I need to provide anything?

Our tech will need to run an extension cord from his van to any power point you have available, he carries a 20m extension cord with him. We may also need a bucket of water. Our tech will have dropsheets for your floor and protection for your bench area.

Why should I choose The Oven Cleaning Company?

We have been cleaning ovens in Oxford since 2006 and have a wealth of knowledge and experience. We don’t just clean ovens but take the time to detail each oven so it won’t just be clean but it will look amazing too. We stand by our guarantee that we will happily return to clean your oven for free if you are not happy with the clean.

Who do we clean for?

We will clean for anyone who has a domestic oven. We believe that oven cleaning is a specialist field and our clients include schools, clubs, landlords, tenants and in general people who are time poor who care about maintaining their cooking appliances.

Do you clean in between the glass panels of the door?

Yes we do . Most oven manufacturers design the oven door so it can be removed and the glass separated enabling our techs to get the glass pristine. We also remove the fan cover and where possible the fan blade so the rear of the oven can be thoroughly cleaned too.

Can I use my oven straight away?

As we only use Environmentally Friendly Solutions your Oven Can be used Straight Away. All of our Cleaning Products are Safe for Your Family and Pets.
